content.question: Which of the following would be most helpful to determine the soil texture of a sample?

choices.label: A pH meter and conductivity meter
A soil core kit and a seismograph
A density gradient tube and a soil triangle
A quadrat and a transect line

content.answer: A density gradient tube and a soil triangle

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
